title: r/Idontworkherelady I Hit Your Employee, And He Bled On Me! FIRE HIM!
description:
r/Idontworkherelady You may think that you've seen the peak of Karen entitlement, but you ain't seen nothing yet. The Karen in today's episode attacks OP and rips part of his skin, causing OP to bleed on Karen. Karen flips out and screams at him for bleeding on her, and wants him fired for what he did. Lady, YOU are the one who attacked HIM! If anything, you should be the one in trouble! If you like this video, be sure to follow for more daily Reddit podcasts!
